scripts.genhello: npm run beaker -- generate --local examples/hello/hello.json examples/hello/
scripts.genstructer: npm run beaker -- generate --local examples/struct/structer.json examples/struct/
scripts.genopup: npm run beaker -- generate --local examples/opup/opup.json examples/opup/
scripts.genamm: npm run beaker -- generate --local examples/amm/amm.json examples/amm/
scripts.genavm7: npm run beaker -- generate --local examples/demo_avm7/demo_avm7.json examples/demo_avm7/
scripts.regen: npm run genhello && npm run genstructer && npm run genopup && npm run genavm7 && npm run genamm
